name: Blazehowl Noct

ability.name: Darkflame Lion
ability.description: Can be ridden. While fighting together, Neutral Pals drop more items when defeated.

description: While it prefers raw meat, it always ends up eating tainted meat. This is due to its dark claws, which it uses as its weaponâ€”it simply doesn't realize its prey got cursed.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Flare Arrow
skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

skills.name: Ignis Breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Spirit Flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Ignis Rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

skills.name: Fire Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
